histogram.name: GCM.AccountMappingMessageReceived
histogram.summary: Records that a message has been received from a delivery channel powered by the GCM account mappings.

histogram.name: GCM.CheckinRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM checkin request.

histogram.name: GCM.CheckinRequestStatusNetError
histogram.summary: Network error code for a GCM checkin request that failed because of a network error.

histogram.name: GCM.ClientStartDelay
histogram.summary: Records the time for which GCM client start task has been delayed. Recorded whenever GCM client is requested to start.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.DecryptMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of decryption on a received GCM message, which includes unencrypted messages, successfully decrypted messages and decryption failures.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.RemoveKeySuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of removing keying material from the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Database.Open
histogram.summary: The result of a database open attempt by the GCM store.

histogram.name: GCM.DelayedTaskControlledReadyTime
histogram.summary: Records the time for which tasks in GCM driver were delayed. Recorded once GCM driver is ready (normally this means that GCM client is initialized).

histogram.name: GCM.DeliveredToAppHandler{AppHandler}
histogram.summary: Whether a received GCM message could be delivered to an app handler ({AppHandler}). Recorded for each received GCM message that didn't have encryption issues. This metric was expired between July 2021 and January 2023, and may be missing data until M111.

histogram.name: GCM.LoadStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of loading from the persistent GCM store.

histogram.name: GCM.PendingConnectionEventsAtShutdown
histogram.summary: Number of connection events which have not been sent to GCM. This is recorded only at the time of shutdown to capture the events which are being lost due to shutdown. Because this is recorded at shutdown, this is not guaranteed to be complete and should be treated as a best effort record.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationCacheStatus
histogram.summary: Reports the status of cached GCM registration. This is recorded when a new registration request is considered on the GCM client.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequest
histogram.summary: Number of registration requests sent to Google Cloud Messaging. Recorded immediately after the request has started.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequest.NetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Net error code from a GCM registration attempt. Recorded when URL loading completes.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM registration request. The Unknown error case was split up in M56 (merged mid-beta to M55) to separate out the Response parsing failed, Internal server error, Quota exceeded, and Device has too many registrations cases.

histogram.name: GCM.SendWebPushMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of sending web push messages. Recorded when the message has either been sent, or has been dropped because an error happened.

histogram.name: GCM.StoreSizeKB
histogram.summary: Size of the GCM persistent store in kilobytes at startup. Warning: this histogram was expired from 2018-08-30 to 2021-09-20; data may be missing.

histogram.name: GCM.StoreUpdateSucceeded
histogram.summary: Success indicates successfully updating the GCM persistent store on message update. Failure indicates a failure updating the persistence store.

histogram.name: GCM.UnregistrationRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM unregistration request.

histogram.name: GCM.WebPushReceived.DeviceState
histogram.summary: Device state when receiving a web push message. Indicates if the message was sent with a high priority and if the device was in idle mode. Recorded when a web push message got received.
